meanings.sent1: The small box was liftable with ease.
meanings.sent2: The liftable chair allowed for easy moving around the room.
meanings.sent3: The liftable kitten toy made the children giggle as it bounced up and down.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits were liftable, like a balloon released into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The liftable curtain revealed a hidden doorway behind it.

meanings.definition: Able to be raised or elevated.
meanings.sent1: The liftable platform slowly ascended to the top floor.
meanings.sent2: The liftable flag fluttered proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The liftable balloon soared high above the treetops, carrying a message.
meanings.sent4: His voice was liftable, reaching the far corners of the room effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The liftable bridge allowed ships to pass underneath easily.

meanings.definition: Suitable for being picked up or carried.
meanings.sent1: The liftable bag was perfect for carrying groceries.
meanings.sent2: The liftable suitcase had wheels for easy transport.
meanings.sent3: The liftable puppy was light enough for the little girl to carry.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was liftable, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The liftable box contained a surprise gift inside.
